page.title: 10BODFARI RECREATION ROOM
page.content: The recreation room is a very popular meeting place in the village,and is used by many organisations and clubs. The building is made of wood and comprises of a large hall with a stage,snooker room,kitchen,pool room, toilets and smaller store room. Recently it has become popular to hire the room for birthday parties,with plenty of room for a disco afterwards. Other users include the youth club, which meets every Friday,an over 55 club,and a toddler group which meets twice a week. Occasionally the hall becomes a polling station for local and general elections.Though there is no telephone, the school opposite can be used in emergencies.Fund raising activities such as jumble sales are also held there.
